title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description: On LinuxMotif and w2k:1. Setup JUnit2.
OB: When attempting to delete fields using refactoring, the context menu is not shown. Instead, a message dialog immediately prompts the user to confirm deletion of the getter/setter as well.
EB: When attempting to delete fields using refactoring, the context menu should be shown. It should not immediately prompt the user to delete the getter/setter.
SR: Ensure that the context menu is displayed when trying to delete fields during refactoring. The message dialog should only appear after the user selects the field to delete.
